item.description:
Maine is pleased to be hosting the 6th Annual Northeast Permaculture Convergence which will be held July 2 - 4, 2010 at MOFGA's Common Ground Education Center (the Fairgrounds!) in Unity, Maine.

Full Convergence details are available here: http://northeastconve...

You can RSVP on this site if you like (so we all know who's going, organize carpools, etc.) but you will need to buy your ticket in advance here: http://permacultureco...

Space will be limited and, based on the quality and quantity of sessions I'm seeing, I'm pretty sure this will sell out! This will be an amazing event for those both steeped in permaculture as well as those new to the concept and the application of permaculture.

Hope you can make it!
LisaF,
Your Organizer:)

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: 6th Annual Northeast Permaculture Convergence
